apps.localizedDescription:
The most advanced jailbreak tool for iOS 11.0 to iOS 14.3

Stable: Utilizing proper and deterministic techniques, jailâ€‹break stability is guaranteed.
Secure: Utilizing native system sandbox exceptions, security remains intact while enabling access to jailbreak files.
Extensively Tested: Unc0ver has been extensively tested to ensure it's a seamless experience on all devices.
apps.name: Unc0ver
apps.subtitle: The most advanced jailbreak tool
apps.versionDescription: Make Xcode debugging work on iOS 14 by patching an Apple bug that caused it to break after rebooting userspace

apps.localizedDescription:
Jailbreak for all devices, from iOS 12.2 to 12.5.1

Note: Only Nonce setter available on 12.1.2 - 12.3 and 12.4 on A12
Note: 12.1.3 - 12.5.1 only supported on A7 - A11 devices. All devices supported on 12.0 - 12.1.2
On iOS 12 to 12.1.2? Download the IPA from https://chimera.sh instead! (why are you on such an old ios tho)
apps.name: Chimera
apps.subtitle: Your device, your way.
apps.versionDescription:
* Fully reliable userspace reboot
* Sileo icon now shows up reliably on fresh bootstraps
* uicache runs on rootfs restore and removes jailbreak app icons
* New Chimera splash screen on userspace reboot

apps.localizedDescription: A new jailbreak for a new era. Odyssey is a snappy, responsive experience that you can't find anywhere else, with support for all iOS versions from iOS 13.0-13.7, including A12 & A13 devices. Odyssey is completely open source, written almost entirely in Swift and welcomes community contributions and pull requests, as a tribute to the dearly departed s0uthwes and his continued optimism and faith in the project. Odyssey comes with the open source Procursus bootstrap, designed from the ground up with openness and compatiblity in mind. Odyssey also comes equipped with full libhooker support, so speed and reliabilty are ensured.
apps.name: Odyssey
apps.subtitle: A new jailbreak for a new era.

apps.localizedDescription: Rewound turns your smartphone into your favourite MP3 player from the early 2000s. Access your whole Apple Music library with the swipe of a clickywheel.
apps.name: Rewound
apps.subtitle: iPod Classic for iPhone
apps.versionDescription: Rewound has been pulled from AppStore. Further updates are unlikely.

apps.localizedDescription:
Rocket for Instagram is the one and only tweak that you'll need for Instagram. Made by Instagram users for Instagram users.
Anonymous Viewer

View other users' stories and messages without notifying them that you've seen their media.
Grid Feed Layout

Rocket for Instagram brings the much-beloved grid layout for the home feed.
Save Posts to Gallery

With Rocket for Instagram, you can save any photo or video posted on Instagram to your device.
Friendship Status

Check whether other users follow you or not by simply visiting their own profile.
apps.name: Instagram++
apps.subtitle: Instagram Rocket

apps.localizedDescription: Kodi (formerly XBMC) is a free and open source media player application developed by the XBMC/Kodi Foundation, a non-profit technology consortium. Kodi is available for multiple operating-systems and hardware platforms, featuring a 10-foot user interface for use with televisions and remote controls. It allows users to play and view most videos, music, podcasts, and other digital media files from local and network storage media and the internet.
apps.name: Kodi
apps.subtitle: The ultimate entertainment center
apps.versionDescription: Updated to Kodi 19.0. View the changelog here: https://kodi.tv/article/kodi-190-matrix-release

apps.localizedDescription:
RetroArch is a frontend for emulators, game engines and media players.

It enables you to run classic games on a wide range of computers and consoles through its slick graphical interface. Settings are also unified so configuration is done once and for all.

In addition to this, you will soon be able to run original game discs (CDs) from RetroArch.

RetroArch has advanced features like shaders, netplay, rewinding, next-frame response times, runahead, machine translation, blind accessibility features, and more!
apps.name: RetroArch
apps.subtitle: All-in-One emulator for iOS.
apps.versionDescription: Updated RetroArch to 1.9.0. View the changelog here: https://www.libretro.com/index.php/retroarch-1-9-0-released/

apps.name: Provenance
apps.subtitle: Emulator for iOS

apps.localizedDescription:
Play your PSP games in HD!
PPSSPP can run your PSP games on your PC in full HD resolution, and play them on Android too. It can even upscale textures that would otherwise be too blurry as they were made for the small screen of the original PSP.

Even on modern Android phones and tablets, you can often run at double the original resolution.

Enhance your experience!
Play in HD resolutions and more
Play on a tablet for big-screen mobile gaming
Customize on-screen touch controls or use an external controller or keyboard
Save and restore game state anywhere, anytime
Crank up the anisotropic filtering and texture scaling
Continue where you left off by transferring saves from your real PSP
Free & Open Source
PPSSPP is an open source project, licensed under the GPL 2.0 (or later). Anyone is welcome to contribute improvements to the code. Partly thanks to such contributions, PPSSPP's compatibility is steadily increasing, letting us all play our PSP games on the devices of our choice.
apps.name: PPSSPP Stable
apps.subtitle: PSP emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Updated to 1.11.2. Includes lots of bugfixes and improvements.

* Unc0ver
* Odyssey
* Chimera
* Rewound
* YouTube++

* RetroArch
* Provenance

news.title: RandomSource Status

news.caption: Randomblock1.com has been acquired. Please update your sources to https://randomblock1.com/altstore. Randomblock1.rocks no longer works, and if you continue using randomsource.imfast.io it may stop working.

news.caption: Great! Everything seems to be in working order, and you can now access RandomSource apps.
